entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:34 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
